title: What do you think about Tony Kakkar’s singing and his song lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Jab demand hi kachre ki hogi tab supply bhi toh kachra hi hoga.” ~ a great youtuber Tony kakkar is making what people want, people give him not only views but also money, fame and motivation to make such more songs. Many people have problem with his songs(they hate his songs). Many people roast him and make memes or jokes about him and in turn giving him popularity. I don’t hate him, actually i like two of his songs, mile ho tum humko and hook up song. Otherwise I don’t remember any of his songs because I don’t listen to songs again and again which i don’t like but I don’t know who forces some people to listen to songs they don’t like again and again and make them on trending.
As frankly speaking, Tony Kakkar's singing is nice but his lyrics can’t be compared with Honey Singh. According to my point of view, Honey Singh is one of the best singer in singing and lyrics.
